MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:00pm due to an overhead cable fault in the Pathead area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:45pm on Thursday, 10 December 2020
